sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Digital Voice and Likeness Protection Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Digital Voice and Likeness Protection Act.

sections.heading: Application. This Act applies to agreements entered into after the effective date of this Act.
sections.text: Application. This Act applies to agreements entered into after the effective date of this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
